title: The 'Chandrika Haaram': Diamond, Emerald, and Tanzanite Bridal Necklace
materials: and rare tanzanite (TNZ Manya) beads. Features Hyderabadi polish for a lasting shine.
features: This statement haaram features intricate floral and paisley (manga malai) motifs meticulously embedded with sparkling diamonds. Emeralds are strategically placed to enhance the design's richness. Cascading tanzanite beads add a touch of modern elegance. The detachable pendant echoes the haaram's design, offering versatility.
colors: accentuated by the green of the emeralds
pink of the rubies and blue of the tanzanite beads
creating a harmonious and regal color palette.
occasions: Perfect for a grand Indian wedding (Vivahaalu)
or other celebratory occasions like Seemantham (baby shower) or Half-Saree Function (Langa Voni Function). Makes a stunning heirloom piece.
description: This Chandrika Haaram is a masterpiece of South Indian craftsmanship, blending traditional design with modern gemstone accents. The use of high-quality diamonds, emeralds and rare tanzanite guarantees lasting value and beauty. Its versatile design allows for multiple styling options, making it a cherished addition to any bridal trousseau (పెళ్లి కానుకలు).
